flawed_nl_solution:
Marlon gave Emily 42 x 2/3 = <<42*2/3=126/2>>126/2 lollipops.
So, he only had 42 - 126/2 = <<42-126/2=-21>>-21 lollipops left.
After keeping 4, Marlon gave -21 - 4 = <<-21-4=-25>>-25 lollipops to Lou.
#### -25

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 28, not 126/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
